manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy Installation Step 1. Attach to cleaned device Step 2. Peel back protective layer Step 3. Gently drop on the device

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Easy to Install and Great Protection
reviews.reviewText: These tempered glass screen protectors are truly amazing. The package includes everything you need to install it perfectly, and although I'm notoriously uncoordinated I found it super easy. The steps are to wipe your phone with an alcohol wipe, clean it with a soft cloth, put this frame-like thing over the phone, peel the backing off the screen protector and apply to the phone. It went perfectly in like three minutes total. No bubbles, no mis-alignment. Best of all, the protector doesn't interfere with the responsiveness of the touch screen.I forgot mine was there after a while until I dropped my phone on pavement (ouch) and the protector had spider cracks right in the middle. But when I peeled the protector off, my actual phone screen was completely fine - not a scratch. So all I had to do is use the second protector included in the box. I just bought a second box as insurance just in case I break the second protector too. There's really no excuse for anyone with an S9 Plus not to use this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest and Fastest I've used
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good things about the Supershieldz Tempered Glass Screen Protector for my Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus. This product exceeded all my expectations in every way, and I couldn't be happier with the results.First and foremost, the installation was an absolute breeze. The package comes with everything you need to achieve a bubble-free, perfect fit on my phone screen. The clear instructions and included accessories made it an effortless process, even for someone like me who isn't particularly skilled in applying screen protectors.The quality of the tempered glass is top-notch. It's incredibly durable and has already protected my phone from a few accidental drops and scratches without sustaining any damage itself. The screen sensitivity remains unaffected, and it feels just as responsive as it did without the protector.The fingerprint-resistant coating is a game-changer. I no longer find myself constantly wiping smudges off my screen. It stays clean and clear, which enhances my viewing experience and keeps my phone looking pristine.The two-pack is an added bonus, ensuring I have a backup in case of any mishaps. The value for the price is unbeatable, especially considering the level of protection and quality offered by Supershieldz.I can confidently say that Supershieldz has gained a loyal customer in me. This screen protector is an absolute must-have for anyone with a Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus. It's durable, easy to install, and provides top-notch protection. I wholeheartedly give it a 5-star rating and would recommend it to all Galaxy S9 Plus users. Thank you, Supershieldz, for creating a product that truly delivers on its promises!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easiest Installation Ever; Sensitivity Is Meh
reviews.reviewText: Installation kit lets you pop these on really easily, and the fit seems fine. Clarity is excellent.That said, you sacrifice some touch sensitivity.Since I'm using these to help prevent a very minor crack in my screen from getting worse until I get around to replacing my phone, I'm okay with that trade-off, though it's a little annoying since I mainly use my phone for messaging, games, and other touch-based applications. That said, either I'm getting used to it, or it's getting a bit better as it settles in, so we'll see how it goes.YMMV based on how you use your phone. If you're more of a talk-on-the-phone kind of person, these screen protectors might be perfect for you.For me, they'll do for now, though when I replace my phone, I'll probably switch back to the plastic ones, which have served me fine thus far (this is the only screen crack I've ever had, and it happened when I was between screen protectors).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Definitely the best screen protector. It's easy to install, comes with cleaning pads and stickers to remove oil, dirt, and dust from your phone screen. My phone screen has yet to be damaged while using this product, besides the few times I was slow to replaces the cracked protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got My Money's Worth!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product in May 2022 and installed it shortly afterwards. I dropped my phone a couple of weeks ago and it cracked my screen protector. Since there were 2 screen protectors in my purchase, I went ahead and installed the second one. Both installations were super easy! The pictures show the damage the screen protector took. My phone's screen is completely fine! The screen protector stays intact and it doesn't even seem like it's there. Thank you for providing a quality product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for.
reviews.reviewText: I had the same experience as many other reviewers.The screen is super easy to install using the included guide.Since there is only adhesive around the edges there was a slight gap between the screen and shield. However, reduced screen sensitivity was minor, in my opinion.It lasted a couple of weeks until i dropped my phone. No damage to the phone but the protector popped right off and the adhesive will not re-stick to the phone. Bu its a 2 pack so I'll put the other one on and see how far I get.Its definitely not a great screen protector. However, at 11 bucks for a 2 pack its $5 attempt at protection. Not breaking the bank. Its performance equaled the cost.Update. As I stated earlier, you get what you pay for so I really can't be too surprised at the poor quality of this screen protector. They pop off if the phone is dropped or handled roughly. Once they are off, the adhesive no longer secures sufficiently to the phone.Do not buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money, easy to use. Would recommend
